unnormalised: State budgets in India, like Kerala's, are crucial for development. Resource allocation impacts infrastructure, education (IIT Madras!), and healthcare. Understanding revenue sources (GST, taxes) and expenditure (like Rs. 5000 crore for agriculture) is key. Did fiscal responsibility targets get met this Diwali? Analyzing budget documents is vital for informed citizenship. Even enjoying biryani responsibly needs a well-managed economy!
normalised: State budgets in India, like Kerala's, are crucial for development. Resource allocation impacts infrastructure, education (I I T Madras!), and healthcare. Understanding revenue sources (G S T, taxes) and expenditure (like rupees five thousand crore for agriculture) is key. Did fiscal responsibility targets get met this Diwali? Analyzing budget documents is vital for informed citizenship. Even enjoying biryani responsibly needs a well-managed economy!
